document_data.name: Chill
document_data.mainbody: '''''Chill''''' was a [[southern magic]] [[divine magic|divine]] spell available to worshipers of [[Osiris]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell saturated an area with chilling, cold air. The spell affected an area with a maximum {{SI|30|ft}} radius. The spell also allowed to focus the cold air to surround a single creature.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Somatic component|somatic]] and [[Verbal component|verbal]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], a feather.
